DOC.brief_title: Culturally Targeted & Individually Tailored Smoking Cessation Study : LGBT Smokers

For Phase 2 study , seek enroll 400 participant randomize controlled trial target intervention vs. non-targeted , comparison condition . Both condition consist group counsel session combine nicotine replacement therapy peer support . We expect quit rate , stage readiness , perceive benefit , self-efficacy , treatment adherence high among receive target intervention non-targeted intervention . Furthermore , expect strong LGBT cultural identification salience identity associate satisfaction adherence target intervention .
